name: European Federation of Retail Perfumers
goal: The Fédération Européenne des Parfumeurs Détaillants (FEPD) is the umbrella organization of the national European federations and organizations in the perfumery retail trade and represents the industry’s interests alongside European institutions. The FEPD is mainly centered on defending the selective distribution system, consolidating and intensifying the contacts to the European Commission and European institutions, creating a European qualification framework for the perfumery retail trade, and preventing discrimination in national markets.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Trade
euInitiatives:
Review of the Vertical Block Exemption Regulation
Digital single market
